admire_item_sound.description: The sound event to play when admiring the item.

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

minecraft:behavior.avoid_block.description: Allows this entity to avoid certain blocks.

minecraft:behavior.avoid_mob_type.description: Allows this entity to avoid certain mob types.

ignore_visibility.description: If true, visbility between this entity and the mob type will not be checked.

max_dist.description: Maximum distance to look for an entity

max_flee.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it should stop fleeing.

probability_per_strength.description: Determines how likely it is that this entity will stop avoiding another entity based on that entity's strength

sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for running speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the running speed faster.

walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.

minecraft:behavior.beg.description: Allows this mob to look at and follow the player that holds food they like.

look_distance.description: Distance in blocks the mob will beg from.

look_time.description: The range of time in seconds this mob will stare at the player holding a food they like, begging for it.

items.description: List of items that this mob likes.

minecraft:behavior.break_door.description: Allows the actor to break doors assuming that that flags set up for the component to use in navigation.

minecraft:behavior.breed.description: Allows this mob to breed with other mobs.
